message.body: Hey mb. Does metal tend to hold emotional stuff in the body since its spirit is the po? Sometimes i feel like i seem like a hypochondriac and like it tak
es a lot of effort to keep a relatively balanced body. Random ailment of this week: iritis. Taking steroid drops. Doc said could be random or linked 2 my
Or maybe i'm just a complainy earth!

Hmmm. Good question about metal. I think probably not because physical level ailments occur across the cf spectrum. But maybe? I would think maybe where symptoms exist could be significant maybe? You are not at all complainey! You are lovely!!! I had a to
Ha ha there's always work to do on the self, i'm learning too. I'm joining ur lovely pity party! U deserve it, given all u've been thru lately!

You deserve it too! What lifted me out was Pat brought me orange juice from Walmart she hauled on the 64 bus and something inside m lit up with the tangible reminder that someone loves me!!!! Haha and so funny!
You can always call me if you want some laughs or love or anything. I love you and I love talking on the phone!!! xoxoxo
I just had a great poop for the first time in awhile and felt so good I wanted to run around the block! Pooping is so important!!!
